author: AdrianoDee
body: #### PR description: This PR proposes to reduce the number of default GEN events for `B0ToJpsiK0s_JMM_Filter_DGamma0_TuneCP5_13p6TeV` to be processed by the RelVal machine to 18M. As is we produce 38M, that with a 2.8% GEN-efficiency become ~1M. With this statistics we end up having >120k well reconstructed $B^0$. With the new setup we should produce >50k clean candidates that should be well enough for a release validation. #### PR validation: None.
title: Reduce RelVal Events for `B0ToJpsiK0s_JMM_Filter_DGamma0`
